name: Skipease People Search & Public Records
tag_list: people, people-search, find-people, people-finder, person-search, person-finder, public-records
description: A people search and public records site.
overview:
Skipease.com is a free people search and public records directory and search engine.

The site is a portal to hundreds of the internet’s top people search engines, social networks and public records searches.

Skipease contains listings to both private and government created people searches and public records searches.

The site is typically used by professional skip tracers, legal professionals, including lawyers and paralegals, private investigators as well as people who are looking to find and reunite with past friends and family.
